Actions.Name: Rocket Boost
Actions.Description: The [name] rushes 4 spaces, also ignoring all terrain and height penalties while moving, then shoves all adjacent characters 1.
Actions.Effects: This action becomes a free action if the Trooper activated an exceed effect this turn.

Actions.Name: Ground Pound
Actions.Description: Foes in a small blast area effect in range take 2 damage. Any foe in the center space is weakened, and that space becomes a pit.
